entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
